title: Redeploy and rebuild the existing application

requirements.summary: Rebuild and redeploy the full application in its current state without any feature changes, ensuring all existing functionality is restored and operational
acceptanceCriteria: The backend Motoko actor deploys successfully with all existing questions and result storage functions intact.
The frontend builds and loads without errors.
The quiz flow (topic selection, participant form, questions, summary) works end to end.
The admin leaderboard page loads and displays results correctly.

file_operations.description: Verify that the router configuration includes all three existing routes (/, /quiz, /admin) and confirm that route definitions are correct for deployment
Confirm the hero banner and TopicSelector integration are functioning correctly, ensuring navigation to /quiz works on topic selection

Verify the complete quiz flow including ParticipantForm rendering, question shuffling and display, answer tracking, score calculation, result submission to backend, and QuizSummary rendering on completion
Confirm the admin leaderboard table correctly fetches and displays results from the backend with proper ranking, badges, and print functionality
Ensure topic cards render correctly with icons, question counts, and proper onSelect callback handling
Verify form validation and submission logic work correctly before starting the quiz
Confirm question display, answer selection, feedback rendering, explanation toggle, and navigation controls function properly
Verify results summary displays participant info, score, performance rating, answer breakdown, and action buttons correctly
Confirm the backend actor creation and caching logic works correctly for both authenticated and anonymous contexts
Verify all three React Query hooks (useAllQuestions, useQuestionsByTopic, useResults) correctly fetch data from the backend actor with proper caching
Confirm AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout functionality, and identity state management work correctly
Verify the application entry point correctly initializes QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers
Confirm the HTML entry point correctly mounts the React app and loads the main module
Verify global styles, Tailwind configuration, OKLCH color tokens, and utility classes are correctly applied
Confirm Tailwind configuration including dark mode, custom fonts, color tokens, and animations is correct for deployment
